sentences: Co-Chairs Sok Appadu and Turesson facilitated informal consultations on timing of submissions of second and, where appropriate, third national communications.
Intervals of four or five years are under consideration.
Parties have been considering proposals from the G-77/China, and will reconvene at 11:00 am Tuesday morning.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
